name: GED Practice Tests
description:
The purpose of this program is to assist students preparing to take the *GED exam.

A variety of tests and quizzes are available that cover Mathematics, Science, English and Social Studies.

Students may also track their scores over time and quickly get a visual indication of their progress and readiness.

Currently, a number of new tests and quizzes are being prepared to be added to the program. Any suggestions or feedback that may help me to improve the program is welcomed. 

*GED is a registered trademark of the American Council on Education (ACE) and administered exclusively by GED Testing Service LLC under license. This material is not endorsed or approved by ACE or GED Testing Service.
